title: Slayer task/Birds

properties.name: description
properties.value: Birds can be assigned as a slayer task from Turael. They have no requirements to be assigned and are generally meant as tasks for beginners. There are a wide variety of birds, but the most commonly killed are chickens, seagulls and ducks, which are low-level, rarely deal damage and easy to access. Chickens drop bones, raw chicken and feathers, most other birds only drop bones or nothing at all, meaning there is little reason to slay higher-level birds.

Birds
Requirements

OtherNone
Task Amounts
Turael15-50
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Birds can be assigned as a slayer task from Turael. They have no requirements to be assigned and are generally meant as tasks for beginners. There are a wide variety of birds, but the most commonly killed are chickens, seagulls and ducks, which are low-level, rarely deal damage and easy to access. Chickens drop bones, raw chicken and feathers, most other birds only drop bones or nothing at all, meaning there is little reason to slay higher-level birds.


Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Duck 1 3
  • River Lum
  • Pond north-west of Lumbridge
  • Falador park
  • Fisher realm
  • Various other locations.
  • Common bird usually found near or in bodies of water. Ranged and Magic recommended to attack.
Chicken 1 3
  • Lumbridge farm
  • Farmer Fred's farm
  • Falador farm
  • Hemenster
  • Witchaven
  • Rellekka
  • Hosidius
  • Various other locations. See Chicken for a complete list of locations and numbers.
  • Most common bird variety.
Undead chicken 1 3
  • Port Phasmatys farm
  • Undead version of a chicken. Requires access to Morytania.
Rooster 2 5
  • Rellekka
  • Miscellania
  • Varies little from a chicken.
Seagull 2 5
  • Port Sarim
  • Corsair Cove
  • A common bird found by the sea and ports.
Penguin 2 4
  • Ardougne Zoo
  • Here Be Penguins
  • Penguins in Ardougne Zoo are in an enclosure. Here Be Penguins requires access to fairy ring AJS.
Entrana firebird 2 5
  • Entrana
  • Only found on Entrana, where limited weaponry is available, only one spawn and no noteworthy drops.
Bird 5, 11 5, 10
  • Nature Altar
  • Crash Island
  • Ape Atoll
  • Found in the tropics. Requires a certain amount of progress in Monkey Madness I to access Crash Island and Ape Atoll. No drops and not recommended for training.
Chompy bird 6 10
  • Feldip Hills
  • South of Castle Wars
  • Requires completion of Big Chompy Bird Hunting and can only be damaged by ogre bow or ogre comp bow with ogre arrows or brutal arrows.
Terrorbird 28 34
  • Tree Gnome Stronghold terrorbird pen, south-western side.
  • Tree Gnome Village maze, south-west corner.
Mounted terrorbird 31 36
  • Tree Gnome Stronghold
  • Khazard Battlefield
  • Limited number.
Vulture 31 10
  • South-eastern Kharidian Desert.
  • Cannot be harmed by melee while flying. Requires some protection from the desert heat.
Oomlie bird 46 40
  • Kharazi Jungle
  • Requires a certain amount of progress in Legends' Quest to access Kharazi Jungle to kill effectively.
Baby Roc 75 50
  • Troll Stronghold
  • Fought during My Arm's Big Adventure, can only be fought once.

Birds can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] from [[Turael]]. They have no requirements to be assigned and are generally meant as tasks for beginners. There are a wide variety of birds, but the most commonly killed are [[chicken]]s, [[seagull]]s and [[duck]]s, which are low-level, rarely deal damage and easy to access. Chickens drop [[bones]], [[raw chicken]] and [[feathers]], most other birds only drop [[bones]] or nothing at all, meaning there is little reason to slay higher-level birds.
